Html: Hey guys, I've got v3Beta1 of the Club Site up and running at www.Zebu-Cattle-for-Sale.INFO. I've made a TON of coding changes to get this up and running, including recompiling the Subsonic dll to run in Medium Trust. I merged it with the Classifieds Starter kit, added mapping to the events view, ad rotators, an xml file for tracking ad hits, and of course changed the theme, including a couple pages with flexible width in the classifieds section. I still have some tweaking, but I am pretty sure I've got everything working!

MarValUS wrote:

Thanks!
How is your database configured ? is SQL running 2005 ?
